tabConvertExtract.Name: Raspakuj datoteku/Konvertuj u ISO
tabConvertExtract.labelOpenOrDragFile: Open or drag an image to convert or extract

tabDiskToISO.Name: CD/DVD Disk u ISO
tabDiskToISO.chooseISOOrBinCueImage: Please select ISO or BIN/CUE image file

LiteVersionDialog.LiteVersionLimitText: Lite version of AnyToISO works with CD images only (up to 870 MB). In order to work with larger files (DVD and more) you should Purchase Professional version. You'll obtain the registration code unlocking the software after the purchase.

EnterKeyDialog.Caption: Unesi Registarski Kod
EnterKeyDialog.EnterKeyToUpgradeText: Molimo unesite vas registarski kod da nadogradite AnyToISO u Pro Verziju.

AboutDialog.Caption: O AnyToISO
AboutDialog.CopyRight: Ovaj kompjuterski program je zasticen zakonom o autorskim pravima i medunarodnim ugovorima. Neovlasceno umnozavanje ili distribucija ovog programa ili bilo kog njegovog dela, moze da dovede do ozbiljnih krivicnih kazni.

NewVersionDialog.Caption: AnyToISO Nadogradnja
NewVersionDialog.NewVersionAvailable: Nova verzija %1 of AnyToISO je dostupna. Da li zelite da je sada preuzmete?

PreferencesDialog.Caption: Podesavanja
PreferencesDialog.ShellExtensionInfo: Dodaj contekt menije za opticke diskove, foldere i fajlove podrzanih formata.

PasswordDialog.Caption: Potrebna lozinka
PasswordDialog.FileIsProtected: Datoteka je sifrovana. Da bi desifrovali unesite lozinku:

Messages.Question: Pitanje
Messages.NotEnoughDiskSpace: Izgleda da nema dovoljno slobodnog prostora na disku (samo %1) na izabranom disku. \n\nDa li zelite da nastavite?
Messages.ISOAlreadyExists: Izlazna ISO datoteka\n%1\nvec postoji, da li zelite da je presnimite?
Messages.FolderAlreadyExists: Izlazni folder\n%1\nvec postoji, da li zelite da presnimite sve postojece datoteke sa istim imenom?
Messages.RestartProgram: Da biste dovrsili registraciju morate restartovati program. \n\nDa li zelite sada da restartujete?
Messages.CancelOperation: Da li ste sigurni da zelite da prekine tekuce operacije?

StatusMessages.CannotOpenSourceFile: Nije moguce je otvoriti izvornu datoteku.
StatusMessages.ClickToOpenISOInExplorer: Click here to open the output ISO file in Explorer
StatusMessages.ClickToMountISOInFinder: Click here to mount the ISO in Finder
StatusMessages.ClickToOpenOutFolder: Click here to open the output folder

DiskToISO.CannotCreateFromAudio: Ne mozete da kreirate ISO image sa vise sesija disk ili audio disk, da bi mogli kontaktirajte korisnicku podrsku za pomoc.
DiskToISO.PleaseUseBinCue: Please use BIN/CUE image for such disks
DiskToISO.ReadError: Greska pri citanju podataka %1, kontaktirajte podrsku za pomoc
DiskToISO.DeviceIsCopyProtected: Ovaj uredaj je verna kopija zaљticen je i sifrovan. Nije moguce nastaviti.
DiskToISO.CannotReadDiskToc: Failed to read TOC (table of contents) of the disk
DiskToISO.DiskNotPresent: Disk not present or unknown media type
DiskToISO.NoTracksOnDisk: There are no tracks on the disk, it's probably blank
DiskToISO.WritingTrack: Writing track %1, track length is %2 sectors
DiskToISO.TrackReadingStopped: Reading stopped at %1, resuming with next track

FolderToISO.SkippingBigFile: Preskakanje datoteke '%1'. Veca je od 4 GB
FolderToISO.BigFileWarning: Datoteka '%1' je veca od 4 GB i nece biti vidljiva u ISO 9660 sistemu datoteka.
FolderToISO.NestedDirectoriesLimitWarning: Struktura direktorijuma je dublja nego %1 nivo, neke datoteke i folderi bice preskoceni.
FolderToISO.UnableToOpenFile: Nije moguce otvoriti datoteku '%1' za citanje.

UniversalConverter.AudioCDWarning: Image izgleda da %1 Audio CD image, konvertovanje u ISO nije moguce.
UniversalConverter.NotValidImage: Greska: Ovo nije validan CD/DVD image
UniversalConverter.CannotFindSignature: Greska: nije moguce pronaci ISO_9660 potpis, dostignuto je 5 MB limita.
UniversalConverter.MultiSessionNotSupported: The disk image is a multi-session disk image. Such images are not supported.

NrgConverter.NrgParsingError: NRG parsing error, please contact support for assistance
NrgConverter.NoSessionsFound: No NRG sessions detected, please contact support for assistance

ExtractISO.ChooseISOFS: Tamo vise fajl sistema u ovoj ISO otisak, molimo Vas da izaberete jedan od njih da izvuce:
ExtractISO.InvalidISO: Datoteka nije validan ISO image ili trenutno nije podrzan

UIFConverter.MixedImageFound: Mesoviti tip image %1 pronadjen, unkompresovanje u privremeniu datoteku...

DMG.ExtractingMainPartition: Vadenje glavne DMG particije na privremenu datoteku, to moze potrajati neko vreme - sacekajte...
DMG.NoVolumeFound: Volume nije nadjeno, u potrazi za HFS + fajl sistemu...
DMG.CorruptedOrPasswordProtected: Greska: ostecena ili zasticena lozinkom DMG image
DMG.XarArchiveDetected: DMG file is actually a XAR archive (normally with actual DMG file inside) that can be only extracted. Please choose extract operation to proceed

PDIConverter.InvalidOrBrokenImage: Nevazeci ili polomljen InstantCopi PIO image

ISZConverter.WarningPassword: Neispravna lozinka ce izlaznu gatoteku dati ntvazecom

XarUnpacker.NestedArchiveFound: Extracted file '%1' can be unpacked separately as %2 archive (append extension manually)

ShellExtension.ConvertToISOInfo: Konvertuj disk image datoteku u ISO format
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromFolderInfo: Kreiraj ISO image u ovaj folder sa osnovnim opcijama
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromFolderWithOptionsInfo: Napravi ISO image ovog foldera sa navodenjem opcije sistema datoteka i Volume Label
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromDisk: Kreiraj ISO image na ovaj disk
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromDiskInfo: Napravi ISO image odabranog optickog diska
ShellExtension.CreateBINCUEFromDisk: Create BIN/CUE image of this disk
ShellExtension.CreateBINCUEFromDiskInfo: Create BIN (raw) image of a selected optical disk and its corresponding CUE sheet file

UpdateChecker.NewVersionAvailable: A new version of %1 is available!
UpdateChecker.NewVersionAvailableText: %1 %2 is now available - you have %3. Would you like to download it now?
UpdateChecker.MessageNoUpdateAvailableDescription: %1 %2 is currently the newest version available.
UpdateChecker.MessageErrorConnect: An error occurred while downloading the update. Please try again later.
UpdateChecker.MessageErrorParse: An error occurred while parsing the update feed.
